title: Register Your Visit Card
description: Please provide the following information to join the DSML Kazakhstan community.
successDescription: Your visit card has been created successfully. You can now view your profile page.
error: An error occurred while creating your visit card. Please try again.
relevantPositionPlaceholder: Your role at the relevant company
aboutYouError: The 'About You' section must contain at least 10 words.
